sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section class="app-main">
    <transition name="fade-transform" mode="out-in">
      <router-view :key="key" />
    </transition>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'AppMain',
    computed: {
      key() {
        return this.$route.path
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>
  .app-main {
    /*50 = navbar  */
    height: calc(100vh - 84px);
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    overflow-y: auto;
    padding: 20px 15px 15px;
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }

  .fixed-header+.app-main {
    padding-top: 50px;
  }
</style>

<style lang="scss">
  // fix css style bug in open el-dialog
  .el-popup-parent--hidden {
    .fixed-header {
      padding-right: 15px;
    }
  }
</style>
